skill.s1.name: Choir of Doves
skill.s1.description: Increases all allies' [b]DMG Dealt[/b] by [b]{skill_data}[/b] + (For every [b]164 ATK[/b], additionally increases [b]DMG Dealt[/b] by [b]1%[/b], up to [b]{skill_data}[/b]) for 2 turn.
skill.s2.name: Poem of Radiance
skill.s2.description: Restores [b]{skill_data} ATK[/b] + [b]{skill_data} HP[/b] to all allies, and dispels 1 debuff from all allies.
When Ange has [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color], consumes 1 stack of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color] to decrease the skill cooldown by 1 action, up to 4 actions.
When Ange manually use this skill, additionally increases healing by [b]50%[/b].
After Ange gains 12 stacks of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color], automatically use the healing from this skill once.
skill.s3.name: Wheel of TIme
skill.s3.description: Increases all allies' [b]ATK[/b] based on [b]11%[/b] + [b]{skill_data} ATK[/b].

Consumes all [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color], for every stack of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color] consumed, additionally increases all allies' [b]PEN[/b] (Increases [b]PEN[/b] by [b]0.1%[/b] for every [b]460 ATK[/b]) and ATK (Increases [b]ATK[/b] by [b]0.2%[/b] for every [b]460 ATK[/b]) for 2 turns. (Counts up to [b]{skill_data} ATK[/b])
skill.s4.name: Myriad Song
skill.s4.description: Dispels 1 debuff from 1 ally, and make them enter a special Extra Turn [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref] after their turn.
When entering [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref], that character's status will rewind to their last turn before using a skill.
Rewind content includes: Persona skill cooldown, current status, current HP, current SP.
skill.p1.name: Combat Skills
skill.p1.description: Attribute Improvement: Increase all allies' stats by [b]20%[/b] of Ange's stats.
skill.p2.name: Grace
skill.p2.description: Increase the ATK for allies under [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [b]{skill_data}[/b].
skill.p3.name: Resilience
skill.p3.description: Increase all allies' [b]PEN[/b] by [b]{skill_data}[/b] after gaining 1 stack of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color], up to 12 stacks.
awareness.a0.name: Hope to Start Again
awareness.a0.description: At the start of each ally's action, Ange will gain 1 stack of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color], up to 12 stacks.

Ange can use [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref] before any ally's action, can use [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref] at the start of battle.
After using [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref], after 7 Wonder's non Extra Turn, restores 1 usage to [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref].
This effect can only be triggered once per battle.
awareness.a1.name: Prelude to a Wish
awareness.a1.description: At the start of battle, Ange will gain maxed stacks of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color], and decrease Elucidate Thief's cooldown by 4 actions.
After using [ref=s3][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Wheel of Time][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally increases all allies' [b]CRIT Rate[/b] by [b]12%[/b] for 2 turns.
awareness.a2.name: Journey of Aspiration
awareness.a2.description: Increases the Final DMG for allies under [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [b]12%[/b].
When an ally faint, immediately revives and restores [b]20% ATK[/b] + [b]2000 HP[/b] to them, once per battle.
awareness.a3.name: Fluttering Dance
awareness.a3.description: [ref=s2][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Poem of Radiance][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].
[ref=s3][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Wheel of Time][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].
awareness.a4.name: Ripples of Silence
awareness.a4.description: Gains 2 stacks of [color=#ffef5c][b][Holy Song][/b][/color] that can exceed the cap after any ally uses [color=#fcff37][b][HIGHLIGHT][/b][/color]/[color=#57b9ea][b][Theurgy][/b][/color], up to 2 stacks.
awareness.a5.name: Echoes of Vigil
awareness.a5.description: [ref=s1][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Choir of Doves][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].
awareness.a6.name: Eternal Angelic Voice
awareness.a6.description: Ange can additionally use [ref=s4][color=#7c98fc][b][u][Myriad Song][/u][/b][/color][/ref] once initially.
